1.0.name: wordpress/share-center-pro
1.0.description:
Add sharing buttons for Buffer, Facebook, Google +1, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter

The Fastest Social Sharing Plugin for WordPress

Features

  • Loads javascripts asynchronously so it won'y slow down your site
  • Buffer Button
  • Facebook Like Button
  • Google +1 Button
  • LinkedIn Button
  • Pinterest Button
  • StumbleUpon Button
  • Twitter Button
  • Works with the Bit.ly Shortlinks plugin to provide Bit.ly shortlinks including custom domains
  • Can be appended to content or used as a widget

Translations

  • Slovak by Branco of WebHosti
